author: Fox News
title: Psaki pushes renewable energy to stop dependence on foreign oil instead of increasing US production
description: White House press secretary Jen Psaki said that the U.S. needs to decrease its reliance on foreign oil by switching over to renewable energy, not increasing domestic production
content:
